oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable the AlwaysAdmit Admission Control Plugin
oval:metadata.oval:description: To ensure OpenShift only responses to requests explicitly allowed by the admissions control plugin, remove any instance of AlwaysAdmit for the admission control plugin.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable the AlwaysPullImages Admission Control Plugin
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure credentials are required to pull images.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable the DenyEscalatingExec Admission Control Plugin
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable DenyEscalatingExec to prevent privileged pods to execute exec and attach commands.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable the EventRateLimit Admission Control Plugin
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable EventRateLimit to limit the rate at which the API Server accepts requests.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable the NamespaceLifecyle Admission Control Plugin
oval:metadata.oval:description: Setting admission control policy to NamespaceLifecycle ensures that objects cannot be created in non-existent namespaces.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable the NodeRestriction Admission Control Plugin
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable NodeRestriction to limit the Node and Pod objects that a kubelet could modify.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable the PodSecurityPolicy Admission Control Plugin
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable PodSecurityPolicy to reject pods that do not match Pod Security Policies.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable the SecurityContextDeny Admission Control Plugin'
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable SecurityContextDeny to use a Pod Security Policy (PSP).

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable the ServiceAccount Admission Control Plugin
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable ServiceAccount to ensure objects must be created and granted before pod creation is allowed.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable Advanced Auditing for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: AdvancedAuditing should not be disabled.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable Anonymous Authentication to the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: Anonymous access is allowed by default and should be disabled.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Audit Log Maxage
oval:metadata.oval:description: Configure audit log retention.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Maximum Retained Audit Logs
oval:metadata.oval:description: Configure how many rotations of audit logs are retained.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure Maximum Audit Log Size
oval:metadata.oval:description: Configure maximum audit log size.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Audit Log Path
oval:metadata.oval:description: To enable auditing on the OpenShift API Server, the audit log path must be set.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure authorization-mode is set to Webhook
oval:metadata.oval:description: If authorization-mode is configured, it should be set to Webhook.

oval:criterion.comment: authorization mode is set to Webhook

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable basic-auth-file for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: basic-auth-file should not be configured on the master node.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Client Certificate Authority for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The client certificate authority should be configured in servingInfo.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the etcd Certificate Authority for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The certificate authority file should be configured in etcdClientInfo.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the etcd Certificate for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The certificate should be configured in etcdClientInfo.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the etcd Certificate Key for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The certificate key should be configured in etcdClientInfo.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Encryption Provider Cipher
oval:metadata.oval:description: The etcd datastore should be configured with the aescbc cipher.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Encryption Provider
oval:metadata.oval:description: An encryption provider configuration file should be configured.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable Insecure Tokens
oval:metadata.oval:description: insecure-allow-any-token should not be configured on the master node.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable Use of the Insecure Bind Address
oval:metadata.oval:description: OpenShift should not bind to non-loopback insecure addresses.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Prevent Insecure Port Access
oval:metadata.oval:description: All components that use the API should connect via the secured port, authenticate themselves, and be authorized to use the API.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the kubelet Certificate Authority for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The certificate authority file should be configured in kubeletClientInfo.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the kubelet Certificate for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The certificate file should be configured in kubeletClientInfo.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the kubelet Certificate Key for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The certificate key should be configured in kubeletClientInfo.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable kubelet HTTPS connections to the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: HTTPS should be used for connections between the API Server and Kubelets.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable Profiling on the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: Profiling is enabled by default and should be disabled.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the API Server Request Timeout
oval:metadata.oval:description: All components that use the API should connect via the secured port, authenticate themselves, and be authorized to use the API.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable the Secure Port for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: To ensure traffic is served over HTTPS, secure-port should not be zero.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Service Account Certificate Authority Key for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The service account certificate authority should be configured in serviceAccountConfig.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Service Account Private Key for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The service account private key should be configured in serviceAccountConfig.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Service Account Public Key for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The service account public key should be configured in serviceAccountConfig.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Certificate for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The certificate file should be configured in servingInfo.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Use Strong Cryptographic Ciphers on the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: Configure cipherSuites to ensure that the API Server is configured to only use strong cryptographic ciphers.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the Certificate Key for the API Server
oval:metadata.oval:description: The certificate key should be configured in servingInfo.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable Token-based Authentication
oval:metadata.oval:description: token-auth-file should not be configured on the master node.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure Controller bind-address is set
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure Controller bind-address is set.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure OPENSHIFT_PROFILE is not set to web
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure OPENSHIFT_PROFILE is not set to web.

oval:criterion.comment: OPENSHIFT_PROFILE is not set to web

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the controller to rotate kubelet server certificates
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable controller to enable kubelet server certificate rotation.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable terminated-pod-gc-threshold for the Controller Manager
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure terminated-pod-gc-threshold is enabled.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure that use-service-account-credentials is true
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure use-service-account-credentials is true.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable etcd Self-Signed Certificates
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure OpenShift is not using Self-Signed Certificates

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure That etcd Client Certificate Correctly Set
oval:metadata.oval:description: ETCD_CERT_FILE is correctly set

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable Client Certificate Authentication
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure OpenShift has enabled Client Certificate Authentication

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure That etcd Key File Correctly Set
oval:metadata.oval:description: ETCD_KEY_FILE is correctly set

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable etcd Auto Log Rotation
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure OpenShift is not auto-rotating logs.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable etcd Peer Self-Signed Certificates
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure OpenShift is not using Peer Self-Signed Certificates

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure etcd Peer Client Certificate is Correctly Set
oval:metadata.oval:description: ETCD_PEER_CERT_FILE is correctly set

oval:metadata.oval:title: Enable Peer Client Certificate Authentication
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure OpenShift has enabled Peer Client Certificate Authentication

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure etcd Peer Client Key is Correctly Set
oval:metadata.oval:description: ETCD_PEER_KEY_FILE is correctly set

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure unique etcd Certificate
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure OpenShift is using a unique certificate for etcd.

oval:criterion.comment: unique cert is configured for etcd

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure etcd Log Storage
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure OpenShift is configured to store etcd logs in a separate directory from the data.

oval:criterion.comment: separate etcd data directory is configured

oval:metadata.oval:title: Manage Image Provenance using ImagePolicyWebhook Admission Controller
oval:metadata.oval:description: Manage Image Provenance using ImagePolicyWebhook Admission

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the kubelet Client CA Certificate
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure the OpenShift node kubelet is using certificates

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the kubelet for Unlimited Event Generation
oval:metadata.oval:description: All events should be captured and not restricted as this helps in reconstucting the chain-of-events.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure That The kubelet Client Certificate Is Correctly Set
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure that the kubelet TLS client certificate is configured by setting the cert-dir path for the kubelet certificates.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure That The kubelet Client Certificate Is Correctly Set
oval:metadata.oval:description: Ensure that the kubelet TLS client certificate is configured by setting the cert-dir path for the kubelet certificates.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable cAdvisor Port on the kubelet
oval:metadata.oval:description: Disable the cAdvisor Port as it does not require any authentication to connect to the port.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable Hostname Override on the kubelet
oval:metadata.oval:description: The hostname should not be overrided in the node configuration file.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable the Read-Only Port on the kubelet
oval:metadata.oval:description: The read-only-port should be disabled.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the kubelet To Rotate Client Certificates
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable kubelet client certificate rotation.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the kubelet for Automatic Firewall Configuration
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable the kubelet's ability to automatically configure the firewall.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the kubelet To Rotate Server Certificates
oval:metadata.oval:description: Enable kubelet server certificate rotation.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure the kubelet to Prevent Streaming Timeouts
oval:metadata.oval:description: Timouts for streaming connections should not be disabled as they help to prevent denial-of-service attacks.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Disable Scheduler Profiling
oval:metadata.oval:description: Profiling should be disabled on the Scheduler.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Verify /etc/origin/node/node-config.yaml Mode Permissions
oval:metadata.oval:description: This test makes sure that /etc/origin/node/node-config.yaml has mode 0600. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

service chronyd is configured to start and is running

oval:metadata.oval:title: Service sssd Disabled

Property FragmentPath of service sssd is set to /dev/null

oval:metadata.oval:title: SSHD is not required to be installed or requirement not set
oval:metadata.oval:description: If SSHD is not required, we check it is not installed. If SSH requirement is unset, we are good.

oval:criteria.comment: SSH not required or not set

oval:metadata.oval:title: SSHD is required to be installed or requirement not set
oval:metadata.oval:description: If SSHD is required, we check it is installed. If SSH requirement is unset, we are good.

oval:criteria.comment: SSH required or not set

oval:metadata.oval:title: It doesn't matter if sshd is installed or not
oval:metadata.oval:description: Test if value sshd_required is 0.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Verify The SSSD Configuration File Exists
oval:metadata.oval:description: The /etc/sssd/sssd.conf file should exist if it is in use.
